attributes.action: Remove John Bercow from his position
attributes.background:
John Bercow has many times now shown he is a staunch remainer yet hes supposed to be impartial now he only allows mps to vote on anything but leaving the eu on WTO
His seat needs someone who is impartial

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP, including the Speaker, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
